byline.contributor: Andreas Riris contributed reporting from Larnaca, and Declan Walsh and Nour Youssef from Cairo.

abstract: Seif Eldin Mustafa admits hijacking of EgyptAir flight and diverting flight to Cyprus; investigators say Mustafa claims he acted out of desperate attempt to see his former wife and his children since she moved with family to Cyprus 24 years ago.
lead_paragraph: In a court appearance, Seif Eldin Mustafa faced numerous charges in connection with the EgyptAir flight that was diverted to Cyprus.

headline.main: EgyptAir Hijacking Suspect Says He Acted Out of Desperation
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Faces Judge in Cyprus on Hijacking

snippet: In a court appearance, Seif Eldin Mustafa faced numerous charges in connection with the EgyptAir flight that was diverted to Cyprus.
